original_text: Asahel the brother of Joab was fourth, for the fourth month, and his son Zebadiah after him; in his division were 24,000.
korean_text: 넷째 달 넷째 지휘관은 요압의 아우 아사헬이요 그 다음은 그의 아들 스바댜이니 그의 반에 이만 사천 명이요

sentences.original_text: Asahel the brother of Joab was fourth
and his son Zebadiah after him
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아들 스바댜가 그 뒤를 이었으며
